title: Identify the slab
content:
Looking to identify this.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013015936im_/http:/typophile.com/files/brazil_5636.jpg)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [brazil.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013015936/http:/typophile.com/files/brazil.jpg) | 262.51 KB |
author: mediadrink

comments.content:
It's [Alfa Slab](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013015936/http:/www.fontsquirrel.com/fonts/alfa-slab), by [JM Solé](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013015936/http:/jmsole.cl/). The Font Squirrel download includes an SIL OFL use license.  
Don
